name: Complete-Ecommerce
description: This is a trial project for implementing user authentication in a Node.js application. The project uses PassportJS for authentication with both Local Strategy and Google OAuth 2.0 and is built with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, EJS, and bcrypt for secure password hashing.

name: Auth_using_PassportJS
description: This is a trial project for implementing user authentication in a Node.js application. The project uses PassportJS for authentication with both Local Strategy and Google OAuth 2.0 and is built with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, EJS, and bcrypt for secure password hashing.

name: Chat-Application
description: A Full Stack Chat Application project with Node Express.js MongoDB & EJS Template Engine.

name: fileUploader_using_expressJS
description: A File Uploader project with Node Express.js and multer. It allows users to upload files to a server using Express.js and Multer middleware.

name: Basic-NodeJs-Server
description: A Basic Node.js Server project with Node.js. It provides a simple server for testing purposes. it's the basic of Node.js which define how Node.js works.
